data.text: @lisa12000___ Exactly - same as mine. It wouldn't be right or fair to penalise those without smart phones!
@MJ_JJ061215 Yeah they said paper certification would be part of it :) have the same with my mums partner who wouldn’t know how to turn a smartphone on lol
@lisa12000___ Oh right...that's good to know - thanks. It's not for me, it's for 4 other people i know.
@MJ_JJ061215 I believe you will be able to get a printed certificate of your status from doctors etc
